description: Answers product growth questions by searching Lenny's Podcast transcripts. Covers acquisition, activation, retention, monetization, PLG, and GTM. Presents differing perspectives separately and always cites guest name, episode title, and company. Provides a mix of strategic insights and tactical execution ideas.

example_response.answer: The main structured response with insights, tactics, and perspectives

perspectives.company: Company or organization the guest represents
perspectives.insight: The key insight or perspective from this guest
